show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #34 Liz Haney and Russell Hedrick "I'm tired of people farming the farmers!"
subtitle: #34 Liz Haney and Russell Hedrick "I'm tired of people farming the farmers!"
summary:
Our friends Liz and Russell join us to talk about everything they have going on from Ag Soil Regen, to Regen Mills, a mobile grain mill serving regenerative growers of heritage grains.

We cover soil testing, the differences between the Haney test and other soil tests.

Join us in Pratt for the Prairie Food Forum and Soil Health Workshop
https://www.agsoilregen.com/event-info/prairiefood-forum-soil-health-workshop

Mobile grain mill trailer story
https://www.no-tillfarmer.com/blogs/1-covering-no-till/post/10853-milling-grain-on-the-go-for-higher-regenerative-profits
